limitedRealGame.title: Error
limitedRealGame.description: Sorry, but you can't play in real mode for now. Please, contact our support team for more information.

limitedDeposit.title: Error
limitedDeposit.description: Sorry, but you can't deposit for now. Please, contact our support team for more information.

cashLimitEditLargeAmount.title: Limit update successfully
cashLimitEditLargeAmount.description: Please, check your email and follow the received confirmation link to activate limit change.

cashLimitCancel.title: Limit canceled successfully
cashLimitCancel.description: You have successfully canceled the limit. The change will be applied in 24 hours.

coolingOfLimitCancel.title: Limit update successfully
coolingOfLimitCancel.description: The limit will be canceled after 24 hours
